data.title: Standard B Main Trademark + Default TP
data.description: Here's a great setup you can use to catch opponents off guard as they are executing the B Site.

data.title: Aggressive B Main Peek TP + B Heaven Trademark
data.description: Set up an aggressive peek towards B Main like so, for good information and an easy way to rotate quickly and assist B Heaven if needed.

data.title: B Site Top News Rendezvous
data.description: Use this powerful off-angle to pick Attackers contesting for B Main, allowing you to reposition to a different angle quickly.
